title: Basin Analysis for New Ventures
description: A new ventures geologist evaluates a frontier basin to assess its overall hydrocarbon potential before the company considers acquiring exploration acreage.

tasks.description: Gather all available public domain data for the basin, including well data, seismic surveys, and geological maps.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive dataset for the basin is compiled.

tasks.description: Develop a petroleum systems model for the basin, identifying potential source rocks, reservoirs, and traps.
tasks.expected_outcome: A model illustrating the basin's potential for generating and trapping hydrocarbons is created.

tasks.description: Generate a report summarizing the basin's prospectivity and recommend whether to proceed with acreage acquisition.
tasks.expected_outcome: A summary report with a clear recommendation is produced for management.
